column4: how does ubuntu / gnome handle CD's being inserted? i'm looking at my fstab...

why sue?  It's GPL software... you can sell support

canonical got it for free... they get to redistribute and sell support... you can do the same

just making up stories. it's better than wondering how the heck i get this dvd drive to work
what is wrong with it?
i installed it into my pc after i put on ubuntu, i need to add some info into fstab, not sure if it will work either.

do you reckon I can just copy the line I have here for my DVD burner at /dev/hdc and use it, instead replacing /dev/hdd, well, hum.
I'm not sure...
it's just, i need to have it mounted.. well, I'll try this, there shouldnt be too big harm made
if it works I'll.... start a 1$/minute support system and make millions :P
that is a lifesaver too lol
